PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TrackBase
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties in this property set are applicable for IfcSlab with PredefinedType BASESLAB, indicated that the base slab is a track base slab.

PropertyDef.Name: IsSurfaceGalling
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the surface is galling or not.

PropertyDef.Name: SurfaceGallingArea
PropertyDef.Definition: The galling area of the object surface.
